DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain pharmacokinetic data dose proportionality relative bioavailability assessment 2nd generation BTDS patch compare 1st generation BTDS patch .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Proportionality Bioavailability Assessment Buprenorphine Transdermal Delivery System Second Generation Patches
DOC.detailed_description: The objective examine new 2nd generation BTDS patch formulation 2 strength : 3.15 mg 12.6 mg , compare 1st generation patch 2 strength : 5 mg 20 mg , ass dose proportionality relative bioavailability proceed definitive program study . Determination measurement drug concentration blood serial collection time point pre-dose 288 hour post-patch application .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Provide write informed consent . 2 . Healthy male female subject age 18 55 inclusive . 3 . Female subject child bear potential must willing use two highly effective method contraception throughout study , one must include barrier method . . 4 . Male subject willing use contraception partner throughout study 30 day completion study agree inform Investigator partner become pregnant time . 5 . Body weight range 55 100 kg BMI ≥ 18.5 ≤ 29.9 . 6 . Healthy free significant abnormal finding determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory test ECG . 7 . Willing eat food supply throughout study . 8 . The subject 's primary care physician confirm within last 12 month nothing subject 's medical history would preclude enrolment clinical study . 9 . Will refrain strenuous exercise entire study . Exclusion criteria 1 . Female subject pregnant lactating . 2 . Any history drug alcohol abuse . 3 . Any history condition might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion . 4 . Use opioid opioid antagonistcontaining medication past 30 day . 5 . Any history frequent nausea vomit regardless aetiology . 6 . Any history seizures symptomatic head trauma . 7 . Participation clinical drug study 90 day precede initial dose study , participation previous Mundipharma Research Ltd , BUP1505 study participation study study . 8 . Any significant illness 4 week precede entry study . 9 . A history additional risk factor Torsades de Pointes ( e.g . heart failure , hypokalaemia , personal family history long QT syndrome , syncope , family history sudden death ) . 10 . Abnormal cardiac condition include follow : 11 . Use medication within 5 time halflife minimum 14 day prescription medication 7 day overthecounter preparation ( include vitamin , herbal and/or mineral supplement ) , whichever longer , first dose study treatment study ( exception continue use HRT contraceptive ) . 12 . Refusal abstain caffeine xanthine contain beverage grapefruit juice within 48 hour IMP administration last study PK sample take study period . 13 . Weekly alcohol intake exceed equivalent 14 units/week female 21 units/week male . 14 . Consumption alcoholic beverage within 48 hour IMP administration , refusal abstain alcohol duration study confinement least 48 hour last naltrexone dose study period . 15 . History smoking within 45 day IMP administration refusal abstain smoking study . 16 . Blood blood product donate within 90 day prior IMP administration time study , except require protocol . 17 . Positive result urine drug screen , alcohol test , pregnancy test , HBsAg , Hepatitis C antibody , HIV test . 18 . Known sensitivity buprenorphine , naltrexone , related compound excipients contraindication detail Butrans Summary Product Characteristics Nalorex Summary Product Characteristics . 19 . Clinically significant history allergic reaction wound dressing elastoplast . 20 . Subjects dermatological disorder tattoo propose site patch application , history eczema/cutaneous atrophy . 21 . Subjects allow hair remove propose patch application site may prevent proper placement patch . 22 . Refusal allow primary care physician inform .
